David Fumero: personal life and wife

Moving on to his personal life, he is a happily married man. He married his co-actress Melissa Gallo in 2007. The couple fell in love on the set of the series ‘One Life to Live’. After dating for a while, they decided to get married. The two dated for a while and then made the decision to get married. In addition, she made the decision to adopt her husband’s surname.

Together, the couple has had two sons: Enzo and Axel Fumero. Well, if you are a celebrity, paparazzi are always after you to find out about your whereabouts, and information about your controversies and rumors will not remain secret. But in this case, the actor is having a splendid life with his wife and children. And do not get involved in any kind of controversies and rumours.

David Fumero: Net Worth and Social Media Profiles

Talking about his net worth, he must have been earning a considerable amount from his acting career. Therefore, he has a net worth estimated to be around $1 million from his career. Also, his wife has an estimated net worth of around $2 million from the industry.

He is also active on different social media platforms like Instagram and Twitter with personal and verified accounts. But he doesn’t have any Facebook account. On Instagram, he goes for the handle @davidfumero with 57k followers. He has a twitter account @davidfumero with 10.3k followers.
